description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物和企业家，曾任中粮集团有限公司总经理、党组副书记，现任中国通用技术（集团）控股有限责任公司董事长、党组书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician and business executive, former General Manager and Deputy Party Secretary of COFCO Group, currently Chairman and Party Secretary of China General Technology (Group) Holding Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，为世界第二大经济体。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, the world's second-largest economy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

en: University of International Business and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的教育部直属全国重点大学，是“211工程”和“双一流”建设高校。
description.en: A national key university in Beijing, China, directly under the Ministry of Education, and part of Project 211 and the Double First-Class University Plan.

en: China National Cereals, Oils and Foodstuffs Import & Export (Group) Co. Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中粮集团有限公司的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of COFCO Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央企业之一，主要从事粮油食品贸易、加工、仓储和金融等业务。
description.en: One of China's central state-owned enterprises, primarily engaged in grain, oil and food trading, processing, storage, and finance.

nodes.id: 中国通用技术（集团）控股有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国中央企业之一，主要从事先进制造与技术服务、医药医疗健康、贸易与工程承包等业务。
description.en: One of China's central state-owned enterprises, primarily engaged in advanced manufacturing and technical services, medicine and healthcare, trade, and engineering contracting.

description.zh-cn: 于旭波是山东威海人。
description.en: Yu Xubo is a native of Weihai, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 1988年毕业于对外经济贸易大学国际贸易专业。
description.en: Graduated from the University of International Business and Economics in 1988 with a major in International Trade.

description.zh-cn: 于1988年5月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in May 1988.

position.en: Salesman, Manager of Futures Department, Deputy General Manager of Futures Trading Department, Assistant General Manager

description.zh-cn: 历任中国粮油食品进出口总公司业务员，期货部经理，期货贸易部副总经理，总经理助理。
description.en: Successively served as Salesman, Manager of the Futures Department, Deputy General Manager of the Futures Trading Department, and Assistant General Manager at China National Cereals, Oils and Foodstuffs Import and Export Corporation.

description.en: Served as General Manager of COFCO Futures Brokerage Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 中国粮油食品进出口（集团）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国粮油食品进出口（集团）有限公司副总经理。
description.en: Served as Deputy General Manager of China National Cereals, Oils and Foodstuffs Import & Export (Group) Co. Ltd.

position.zh-cn: 董事、总经理、党组成员、党组副书记
position.en: Director, General Manager, Party Leadership Group Member, Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 自2007年4月起，任中粮集团有限公司董事、总经理、党组成员，2016年6月起兼任党组副书记，直至2020年6月卸任。
description.en: Starting from April 2007, he served as Director, General Manager, and Member of the Party Leadership Group of COFCO Group. From June 2016, he also served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group until he left the position in June 2020.

relationships.target: 中国通用技术（集团）控股有限责任公司

position.en: Chairman, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 2020年6月，转任中国通用技术（集团）控股有限责任公司董事长、党组书记。
description.en: In June 2020, he was appointed Chairman and Secretary of the Party Leadership Group of China General Technology (Group) Holding Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

position.en: Deputy for the Inner Mongolia region

description.zh-cn: 2018年，当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会内蒙古地区代表。
description.en: In 2018, he was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress for the Inner Mongolia region.
